resources.string: The fewer expected barcode count, the higher barcode decoding speed. When the expected count is set to 0, the barcode reader will try to decode at least one barcode.
Set the interval of video barcode decoding. It can reduce the battery consumption. Measured by millisecond.
Improve the accuracy at the expense of a bit speed.
Filter out the duplicate barcode results over a period of time.
Set the time period of result deduplication. Measured by millisecond.
Set the RegEx pattern of the barcode text to filter out the unqualified results.
Enhanced focus is one of the Dynamsoft Camera Enhancer features. The specially designed focus mechanism will significantly improve the camera\'s focusing ability on low-end devices.
Frame sharpness filter is one of the Dynamsoft Camera Enhancer features. It makes a quick evaluation on each video frames so that the Barcode Reader will be able to skip the blurry frames.
Sensor filter is one of the Dynamsoft Camera Enhancer features. The mobile sensor will help on filtering out the video frames that are captured while the device is shaking.
Auto-zoom will be available when you are using Dynamsoft Camera Enhancer and Dynamsoft Barcode Reader together. The camera will zoom-in automatically to approach the long-distance barcode.
If enabled, a torch button will appear on the camera view when the environment light level is low.
Set the region of interest via Dynamsoft Camera Enhancer. The frames will be cropped based on the region of interest to improve the barcode decoding speed.
Input Invalid! Region bottom can\'t be smaller than top and right can\'t be smaller than left.
An overlay will be displayed on the successfully decoded barcodes. The display of overlay is controlled by Dynamsoft Camera Enhancer.
Click \"finish\" when the targets are all scanned or when you want to finish scaning.
